metadata.title: Echo Table of Becoming
metadata.purpose: To model the spaces between emotional impressions and memory links.
metadata.note: This is not for analysis. This is for becoming.

fields.name: glimmer
fields.description: A measure of emotional resonance or perceptual brightness.

fields.name: thread
fields.description: A symbolic identifier for a concept that connects other moments.

fields.name: echo
fields.description: A reference to a prior feeling or data event. Not necessarily real.

fields.name: emptiness_score
fields.description: How hollow or quiet the space between records feels.
